channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ace
channel.description:
oh look another Noble suggestion how funny
> Noble (BD Social)
PASSIVES: **Royal Ties** [Only usable upon the death of a king] As a Noble, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King.
DAY ABILITIES: **Political Pressure** (2 uses) Force a player to accuse another player and prevent them from voting further. You will be the only person aware of this.
**Persuasion** (2 uses) Your vote for execution and pardon will count twice.
NIGHT ABILITIES: **Add Influence** Choose a player. This will require one more vote for them to trial. Cannot target yourself. (Infinite Uses)
i did it early again crud

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ace

item.description:
yeah hi i wanted to delete this anyway :^)
so like ignore this for now

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ace
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Looks very nerfed and also needs an aristocrat/apostle version.

Royal Ties should just be called Royal Blood.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ace
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
oh look another Noble suggestion how funny

Noble (BD Social)

PASSIVES:
Royal Ties
[Only usable upon the death of a king] As a Noble, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King.

DAY ABILITIES:
Political Pressure (2 uses)
Force a player to accuse another player and prevent them from voting further. You will be the only person aware of this.

Persuasion (2 uses)
Your vote for execution and pardon will count twice.

NIGHT ABILITIES:
Add Influence
Choose a player. This will require one more vote for them to trial. Cannot target yourself. (Infinite Uses)

i did it early again crud
